# The `IPDBSession` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pdb/ipdbsession">IPDBSession</a> defines an interface used to provide a context for querying debug information from a debug data source (for example, a PDB). <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>class llvm::pdb::IPDBSession</CodeBlock>

## Description {#details}

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pdb/ipdbsession">IPDBSession</a> defines an interface used to provide a context for querying debug information from a debug data source (for example, a PDB).
